sentences.sContent: They spend an inordinate amount of time talking.
sentences.sCn: 他们聊天时间长得超乎想像。

synos.tran: 过度的；无节制的；紊乱的

remMethod.val: in (不) + ordin (正常) + ate → 不正常的 → 紊乱的

trans.tranCn: 过度的；无节制的；紊乱的
trans.tranOther: If you describe something as inordinate, you are emphasizing that it is unusually or excessively great in amount or degree
